description:
Three demon thieves have muscled their way into King Yama’s vault, stealing the three Artifacts of Darkness. Yusuke must recover the artifacts and bring the thieves to justice before they unleash their powers upon the Earth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sambiki no Youkai! Hiei, Kurama, Gouki
三匹の妖怪! 飛影・蔵馬・剛鬼
